title: Oru Naal Oru Naal Lyrics Vaaliba Raja Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Oru naal oru naal
Singer(s):Radhan, Bobo Shashi, Veena Ghantasala
Movie: Vaaliba Rajan
Music: Radhan
Lyrics: Na MuthuKumar

Oru naal oru naal
vennilai kettkum.
Marunaal en nenjam
vinmeenai ketkum

Vazhvile oru kelvikku
vidai rendu illai endru
sonnadhe vandhu sonnadhe
kadhal thaan indru.

En vizhigalil yeno
nulaindhaai yen anbae ?
en uyirnil vandhu kalandhaai, anbae.

Ne kilaigalil poovaai
malarndhaai yen anbae ?
kan edhirinil sarugaai udhirndhaai, anbe.

En theevile
poo pookkum vaasam vandhadhe.
Sollaamaley
azhai alli seludhe.

Kanneerai kadhal endru
kangal sollum neram.
Kaayangalaal en nenjam vegudhe
uravenbadhe pirivenbadhaa
en vaanamaa erigindradhaa.

Vazhvile oru kelvikku
vidai rendu illai endru
sonnadhe vandhu sonnadhe
kadhal thaan indru.

Ingum angum
en ullam aadi sellumey.
Kadhal vandhu
adhai maattri pogudhey.
Kannaadi veettil
indru kallai veesi paarththaen.
Kaaththaadi en kadhal ponadhey.

Vazhvile oru kelvikku
vidai rendu illai endru
sonnadhe vandhu sonnadhe
kadhal thaan indru.

En vizhigalil yeno
nulaindhaai yen anbae ?
en uyirnil vandhu kalandhaai, anbae.

Ne kilaigalil poovaai
malarndhaai yen anbae ?
kan edhirinil sarugaai udhirndhaai, anbe.
